name: Talaxeum
description: TALAXEUM is a blockchain-based currency & platform specializing in supporting green projects. Bringing together those who are interested in offsetting carbon footprints and those who work in the field of agro forestry in getting their projects launched through decentralized tokens. to build a sustainable and self- sustaining green business ecosystem for the future. Talaxeum, Green Project Launcher that focus on supporting Companies / Business to Launch Green Project with support from all Communities using Green Utility NFT LUNATIC will be placed in the Heart of Iconic Heritage Area in Bandung City. This state-of-the-art facility will serve as a hub for the appreciation, exhibition, and development of NFT art. LUNATIC is not only a place for visual art forms but also a place for music performance, art performance, dance performance and many more. Led by Gun Gunawan as CEO of Lunatic, also one of Founder of TALAXEUM, that already has more than 18 years of experience in the financial services industry. His expertise in building business networks and relationships has been instrumental in success of his ventures.
